name: WinHKI HKI3 Archive
summary: An HKI3 file is an archive created by WinHKI, an archive utility developed by Hanspeter Karl Imp. It contains one or more files that have been compressed and packaged together, to reduce their file size and make them easier to store and share. HKI3 files are similar to but compressed differently than .HKI1 and .HKI2 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
